DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : The combination extracorporeal shockwave daily gluteal muscle strength programme superior gluteal muscle strength programme alone cellulite . Study design : Randomized-controlled trial Analysis : Intention-to-treat Outcome parameter : ) Photo , b ) Nürnberger Score , c ) circumference measurement , ) capillary blood flow , e ) tissue oxygen saturation , f ) postcapillary venous blood flow Intervention : Extracorporeal shock wave six session 2000 impulse gluteal thigh region plus specific gluteal strength exercise training Follow-up : 12 week
DOC.criteria: Females age 1865yrs Cellulite 1°4° Informed consent Pregnancy Open wound Females > 18yrs > 65yrs
